author: norman
msg: Change to directory $PHOENIX_HOME/bin before start james to get sure the derbydb directory is created on the right place.
Thx to Joachim Draeger for reporting this. See JAMES-527

author: chamikara
msg: Support for sending and processing both DateTimes and Durations as the expiration.
Corrected the expiration and Filter logics.

author: sanka
msg: I've updated the policyExtensionTemplate and few other classes to support WSSecurity policies at the client-side. Now we can keep on updating it until we get the full WSSecurity policy support.
